short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publish your shopping trail as a game for your followers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guessmine allows you to publish your Amazon shopping journey as a game. For example, if you have looked at 5 t-shirts on Amazon and added 2 of them to cart and finally bought one, you can publish this journey like a game in 1-click. Users who are looking for t-shirt shopping tips can guess which t-shirt you bought and score points. It is a fun way to share your shopping tips and gain followers!
